articles.description: Rangers host Celtic in their first Scottish Premiership meeting of the season plus two more top-flight games.
articles.title: Rangers v Celtic: First Old Firm derby of the season

articles.description: Follow live text & BBC Radio 5 Live commentary as Liverpool host Aston Villa, Wolves travel to Crystal Palace and Arsenal face Man Utd in the Premier League.
articles.title: Premier League: Liverpool v Villa, Palace v Wolves & Arsenal v Man Utd

articles.description: Follow live text updates and BBC Radio 5 Sports Extra online-only commentary from the Italian Grand Prix at Monza.
articles.title: Italian GP: Sainz on pole as Verstappen aims for wins record

articles.description: In his BBC Sport column, George Groves says Chris Eubank Jr produced a career-best performance to beat Liam Smith - and that he can win a world title.
articles.title: 'Eubank proves us wrong - and can win world title'

articles.description: Jude Bellingham scores on his Bernabeu debut to maintain an incredible start to his Real Madrid career.
articles.title: Bellingham's Madrid fairytale continues in Bernabeu bow

articles.description: Match of the Day's Gary Lineker, Ian Wright and Jermaine Jenas look at Manchester City's controversial second goal against Fulham and Erling Haaland's hat-trick.
articles.title: Silva, Fulham and referee let down by VAR - Jenas

articles.description: Mo Farah's final race in his home city of London ends with a fourth-placed finish in The Big Half, as Jack Rowe wins.
articles.title: 'Emotional' Farah fourth in final race in London

articles.description: Follow live text updates and BBC radio commentary from the first day of round 13 of the 2023 County Championship.
articles.title: County Championship, day one - radio & text

articles.description: Former Zimbabwe captain and coach Heath Streak, who had been suffering from colon cancer, dies at the age of 49.
articles.title: Former Zimbabwe captain & coach Streak dies aged 49

articles.description: Everton winger Demarai Gray has appeared to criticise manager Sean Dyche in a social media post.
articles.title: Gray appears to criticise Everton boss Dyche
